|brand = ASUS |model = Zenbo |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC1200 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = intelligent robot, IoT |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = MSQ-ZENBO |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->

|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 32 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |fla2chipbrand = eMMC |fla2chipmodel = <!-- Model? Leave blank if unknown --> |fla2chipmodelfull = <!-- Flash2 full chip info --> |flash2size = 128 GiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 4 GiB |ram1chip = Micron;MT52L256M64D2PP-107 WT:B; |ram1_num = 2 |ram2type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram2type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram2spd = <!-- 3400,3333,3300,3200,3100,3000,2800,2666,2600,2400,2133,2000,1866,1600,1066,1333,800 --> |ram2size = <!-- 2, 4, 8, 16, 32, 64, 128, 256, 512, etc... --> |ram2chip = Micron;; |ram2_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_none = true |oui = AC:22:0B

|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 19 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.37 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Bluetooth 4.0, LCD Display, Camera 13MP, IR LED, Microphone, Speaker, Battery |addchip = Touchscreen Controller;GooDiX;GT9110;;1; ,,, MCU;STMicroelectronics;STM32F303;;1; ,,, <!-- 720p Image Sensor Module;OmniVision;OV9712;;1; ,,, 1080p 30fps H.264 Camera Codec with HDR ISP;GEO Semiconductor;MAX64380;;1; ,,, 16-Bit Mono Audio Voice Codec;Maxim;MAX9860;;1; ,,, Mono 2.6W Class D Audio Power Amplifier;Maxim;MAX98300;;1; --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = ASUS |defaultssid_regex = ^ASUS$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Pegatron |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 07/27/2017 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = 620 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = <!-- Radio module name, optional link, Leave blank for none --> |rad1modif = <!-- Radio Module Interface Type, Leave blank for none --> |rad1chip1cpu = <!-- true, --> |rad1chip1 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |rad1chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |rad1chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |rad1ac = 867 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Intel Atom]] x5-Z8550 @2.5GHz Quad Core (Cherry Trail) <!-- Intel SR2KH --> *Flash: 32GB / 128GB Storage, RAM: 4GB (DDR3) Memory <!-- Micron D9TDW --> *Connectivity: Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 4.0; USB 3.0 (Type A) port; *Camera: 3D Camera (13MP); Operating System: Android; *Speaker: 1x 15W; Microphone: 4x Digital Microphones; *Display: 10.1" WXGA LCD, 10x points multi-touch display *Sensors: IR Drop; Sonar: Auto Recharge, Touch; LED Wheels; *Power Supply: DC 19V/2.37A; Battery: Li-Ion 14.4V/8Ah 95W; *Dimensions: 370 x 370 x 620 mm
==Links of Interest== ===Rewiews=== *[https://theleaker.com/asus-zenbo-personal-assistant-robot/ ''ASUS Zenbo Robot'' on '''TheLeaker''']
==See also== *[[ASUS AiCam]] - ''Smart Cloud NightView Camera'' • [https://www.unifore.net/ip-video-surveillance/asus-aicam-alternative-d1000-smart-wifi-ip-camera.html PR] *[[ASUS AiCam 2]] - ''Smart Cloud NightView Camera'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/AiCam-2/ PPage] *[[ASUS HG100]] - ''Smart Home Gateway'' • [http://armdevices.net/2016/02/18/asus-hg100-rk3066-smart-home-gateway-via-zigbeewifi-bluetooth/ PR] • [https://www.asus.com/sg/Internet-of-Things/ASUS-SmartHome-Gateway-HG100/ PPage] :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/MSQ-RK903 MSQ-RK903] (2015-04-02) • [https://mysmahome.com/news/4305/asus-debuts-smart-home-series-using-zigbee-2/ PR] • [https://mysmahome.com/product/6285/product-introduction-asus-smart-home-gateway-hg100/ PR] *'''ASUS Zenbo''' - ''Home Robot'' • [http://hexus.net/tech/items/laptop/106402-asus-showcases-new-consumer-lifestyle-products-computex-2017/ Computex 2017 PR] :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/MSQ-ZENBO MSQ-ZENBO] (2017-07-27)
